name: OfficeDreamShift
description:
This game let's you switch between a dream and the real world. You solve puzzles/quests on your journey through the office. 

Keyboard controls
  • Move: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Reality shift: Spacebar(unlocked during playthrough)

Devs:

- Tomatpuré(https://tomatpure.itch.io/)

- Cattaco(https://cattaco.itch.io/)

Composer:

-Toby1108p(https://www.youtube.com/c/TobyHere)
